official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit teachers at the elementary and secondary school level, whether or not they itemize deductions, to deduct reasonable and incidental expenses related to instruction, teaching, or other educational job-related activities.

summary.text: Teacher Tax Relief Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any deduction allowable for the qualified incidental expenses (up to a maximum of $400 annually) of an eligible elementary or secondary teacher (including a homeschooling parent).
